p: Interviews of all 14 participants were audio recorded, and the records were transcribed verbatim by a commercial service (QHR Consultants, Madison, WI) to avoid any bias. The team ceased recruitment of the participants once saturation was achieved [ 28]. The interview transcript was analyzed using Thematic Analysis, which enables the themes to arise from the data [ 29]. This method has been described in qualitative analysis as inductive coding [ 29]. The inductive codes were combined, based on the similarities, into categories that led to the emergence of themes [ 29]. During the inductive coding, the principal investigator wrote analytic memos that facilitated the abstraction of the meaning from the data [ 30]. The coded text was condensed into categories that emerged into themes [ 29]. The data analysis was completed in Dedoose, a qualitative software.
